title: Nathan Lane to Return to Broadway This Winter in ‘Pictures From Home’
description: The play, written by Sharr White and directed by Bartlett Sher, will also star Danny Burstein and Zoë Wanamaker.
dc:creator: Michael Paulson
media:description: Nathan Lane will play a photographer’s father in “Pictures From Home,” a play adapted from the memoir by Larry Sultan, at Studio 54 this winter.
